Title: Authorizes the village of Chester to impose a hotel and motel tax; and provides for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
Summary: Authorizes the village of Chester to impose a five percent hotel and motel tax; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the village of Chester to impose a hotel and motel tax; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
